title: Elise VO Spider Form Bug
body:
Is it just me or Elise no longer speaks in her Spider form VO?
I tried Refreshing my client and scanning but my friends too only hear Elise in human form dialogue instead of spider form.

replies.body: Not just you! This is a known issue and we're workin' on a fix!
i noticed this happening too while i was playing her. same thing, i was hearing her human VO while in spider form.
